org.pac4j.core.authorization.generator

Interface AuthorizationGenerator<U extends CommonProfile>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCasAuthorizationGenerator, DefaultRolesPermissionsAuthorizationGenerator, FromAttributesAuthorizationGenerator, KeycloakRolesAuthorizationGenerator, LoadLinkedUserAuthorizationGenerator, RememberMeAuthorizationGenerator, SpringSecurityPropertiesAuthorizationGenerator

    public interface AuthorizationGenerator<U extends CommonProfile>
    Generate the authorization roles and permissions for this user profile.
    Since:
    1.5.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      U generate(WebContext context, U profile)
      Generate the authorization information from and for the user profile.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        U generate(WebContext context,
           U profile)
        Generate the authorization information from and for the user profile.
        Parameters:
        context - the web context
        profile - the user profile for which to generate the authorization information.
        Returns:
        the updated profile or a new one
